name: Drunkzard's Quest
description:
After a long night of watching TV and drinking some alcoholic potions, Drunkzard the wizard finds himself in the middle of a hangover, and cannot control his body!

His wife has also been kidnapped by D. Ragon, will Drunkzard be able to drunkenly save his wife?

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme: Out of Control
